title: U.S. cities with the highest annual temperatures
yAxis: Average temperature in Fahrenheit per year
summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Us City, and Average temperature in Fahrenheit per year in each Us City on the y axis.
The Average temperature in Fahrenheit per year is highest at Us City Phoenix Arizona and lowest at Us City Los Angeles California.
The highest Us City Phoenix Arizona has 12.0 more Average temperature in Fahrenheit per year than the lowest Us City Los Angeles California.
